name: VASRequest.Merchant
desc: The identity of a merchant that offers a loyalty program.

items.name: init(id: String, url: URL?, shouldSendURLOnly: Bool, localizedName: String?)
items.desc: Creates a new merchant object with the specified information.

items.name: var localizedName: String
items.desc: The localized name of the merchant or corresponding loyalty program.

items.name: let url: URL?
items.desc: The URL to display to the customer if the matching loyalty or reward ID isn’t found.

items.name: let shouldSendURLOnly: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether to send the merchant URL to the customer’s device.

items.name: let id: String
items.desc: A unique identifier for the merchant.

items.name: typealias ID
items.desc: A type representing the stable identity of the entity associated with an instance.
